headline:
Closing the cloud strategy, technology, and innovation gap
					To understand how cloud investments relate to strategy and innovation goals, Deloitte recently surveyed cloud decision-makers across multiple industries about their experience with cloud and how business performance and innovation are affected by cloud strategy and maturity.
					Article

<script type="text/javascript">
	 function loadScript(scriptURL){
        // load script
        var scriptTAG = document.createElement('script');
        scriptTAG.type = 'application/javascript';
        scriptTAG.async = true;
        scriptTAG.src = scriptURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(scriptTAG);
      }

      function loadCSS(CSSURL){
        // load css
        var linkTAG = document.createElement('link');
        linkTAG.rel = "stylesheet";
        linkTAG.type = 'text/css';
        linkTAG.href = CSSURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(linkTAG);
      }
      if(!navigator.onLine){
      	loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-base.min.css');
        loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site.min.css');
        loadScript('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-base.min.js');
      	templateType = dataLayer.page.attributes.pageTemplate;
        // for event details template
      	if(templateType == "Event_Details_Page_Template"){
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-event-details.min.css');
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-event-details.min.css');
      	}
        // for blog post template
      	else if(templateType == "Blog_Post_Template"){
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-blog-post.min.css')
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-blog-post.min.css')
      	}
        // for DI Article and multimedia
        else if(templateType == "Deloitte_Insights_Article_And_Multimedia_Template"){
          loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/deloitte-insights/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-di-insights-and-multimedia.min.css');
          loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/deloitte-insights/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-di-article-multimedia.min.css');
        }
      }

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    document.querySelector(
      ".header-frag"
    ).parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.id =
      "header-frag";


    // AOS.init({
    //   duration: 800
    // });



    var fragmentContainer = document.querySelector('#header-frag');
    
    // if ('${theme-color}' == 'black') {
    //   fragmentContainer.classList.add('black-theme');
    // }

    fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll("[data-video-authorable]").forEach(function (el) {
      el.addEventListener('ended', myHandler, false);
      function myHandler(e) {
        setTimeout(function () {
          el.play();
        }, 5000);
      }
    })

    fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll("[data-authorable]").forEach(function (el) {
      if (el.tagName == "A" && el.href.includes('$%7')) {
        if (el.parentNode.dataset.autorableContainer) {
          el.parentNode.style = 'display: none';
        } else {
          el.style = 'display: none';
        }
      }

      else if (el.tagName == "P" && el.textContent.substring(0, 2) == '${') {
        el.style = 'display: none';
      }
      else if (el.tagName == "H2" && el.textContent.includes('${')) {
        el.style = 'display: none';
      }
      else if (el.tagName == "H2" && el.textContent.includes('${')) {
        el.style = 'display: none';
      }
      else if (el.tagName == "BUTTON" && el.dataset.analytics_text.includes('${')) {
        el.style = 'display: none';
      }
    })

    fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll("[data-animation]").forEach(function (el) {
      if (el.dataset.animation == el.dataset.linecolor) {
        el.classList.add('display-animation');
      }
    })

    fragmentContainer.getElementsByClassName('page-hero-image').forEach(function (el) {
      if (el.dataset.novideo == 'yes') {
        el.classList.add('no-video')
      }
    })


    var firstClick = false;

    var PubID = dataLayer.custom.customConversion1.split(":").pop();
    if (PubID != "" && PubID != null) {
      PubID += ":";
    } else {
      PubID = "null:";
    }


    fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll("[data-triggeranalytics]").forEach(function (el) {
      el.addEventListener("click", triggerAnalytics)
    })


    $(".header-frag a").click(triggerAnalytics);

    function triggerAnalytics(e) {
      var str = e.currentTarget['dataset']['analytics_text'] || e.currentTarget.innerHTML;
      var tileName = str.replace(/\s/g, "-").toLowerCase();
      var FragType = "header-frag";
      var ActionType = "click";

      if (window.hasOwnProperty("s")) {
        s.linkTrackVars = "prop1,prop2,prop3,eVar72";
        s.eVar72 = PubID + FragType + ":" + ActionType + ":" + tileName;
        s.eVar72 = s.eVar72.toLowerCase();
        s.prop1 = sc_country;
        s.prop2 = sc_language;
        s.prop3 = sc_country + ";" + sc_language;
        if (firstClick) {
          s.linkTrackEvents = "event71,event72,event23";
          s.events = "event71,event72,event23";
          s.tl(this, "o", s.eVar72);
          firstClick = false;

        } else {
          s.linkTrackEvents = "event71,event23";
          s.events = "event71,event23";
          s.tl(this, "o", s.eVar72);
        }
      }
    }

  });
</script>

  <script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
      setTimeout(function () {
        document.querySelector('.tab-menu').parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.id = 'tab-menu'
  
        var tabTitleList = [
          'Spend wisely',
          'Are more mature',
          'Get higher value',
          'Focus on software engineering',
          'View industry clouds as a catalyst',
          '${tab-title-6}',
          '${tab-title-7}',
          '${tab-title-8}',
          '${tab-title-9}',
          '${tab-title-10}',
        ]
  
        var heroTitleList = [
          '${hero-title-1}',
          '${hero-title-2}',
          '${hero-title-3}',
          '${hero-title-4}',
          '${hero-title-5}',
          '${hero-title-6}',
          '${hero-title-7}',
          '${hero-title-8}',
          '${hero-title-9}',
          '${hero-title-10}'
        ];
  
        var heroSubtitleList = [
          '${hero-subtitle-1}',
          '${hero-subtitle-2}',
          '${hero-subtitle-3}',
          '${hero-subtitle-4}',
          '${hero-subtitle-5}',
          '${hero-subtitle-6}',
          '${hero-subtitle-7}',
          '${hero-subtitle-8}',
          '${hero-subtitle-9}',
          '${hero-subtitle-10}'
        ]
  
        var tabHeaderTitleList = [
          'Spend wisely',
          'Are more mature in their approach to cloud',
          'Get higher value from cloud',
          'Focus on building a software engineering culture',
          'View industry clouds as a catalyst for success and a "force multiplier"',
          '${tab-header-title-6}',
          '${tab-header-title-7}',
          '${tab-header-title-8}',
          '${tab-header-title-9}',
          '${tab-header-title-10}'
        ];
  
        var tabHeaderCopyList = [
          'Leaders spend only slightly more on cloud as a percentage of revenues, which indicates that itâ€™s not the dollars spent, but what they do with them.',
          'Leaders take a multi-cloud approach. Theyâ€™ve also developed a coherent, effective cloud strategy for which apps to move to the cloud while minimizing what they keep on-premises. Theyâ€™re also using more advanced cloud services such as, AI and machine learning, cloud native development, and edge computing/IoT.',
          'Compared to their peers, Leaders say they get very high value from their cloud services. For example, with AI/ML, the percentage of Leaders who say they are getting very high value from cloud is 1.7x higher than for their peers.',
          'Leaders are more likely to be focused on building a â€œstrong software engineeringâ€ culture that can drive problem solving, product velocity, and continuous improvement.',
          'Seventy-four percent of Leaders â€œcompletelyâ€ agree that industry clouds will be the enabler or catalyst for transformation and automation of industry-specific business processes.',
          '${tab-header-copy-6}',
          '${tab-header-copy-7}',
          '${tab-header-copy-8}',
          '${tab-header-copy-9}',
          '${tab-header-copy-10}'
        ]
  
  
  
        var fragmentSelectorList = [
          '-fullwidth-component-tab-1',
          '-fullwidth-component-tab-2',
          '-fullwidth-component-tab-3',
          '-fullwidth-component-tab-4',
          '-fullwidth-component-tab-5',
          '${fragment-selector-6}',
          '${fragment-selector-7}',
          '${fragment-selector-8}',
          '${fragment-selector-9}',
          '${fragment-selector-10}',
        ]
  
  
        var fragmentContainer = document.querySelector('#tab-menu')
        var menuContainer = fragmentContainer.querySelector('#tab-menu_menu_container')
  
        if (!menuContainer) {
          return
        }
  
        // console.log(menuContainer.dataset['numer_of_items'])
  
        var numberOfItems = menuContainer.dataset['numer_of_items'] || 0;
        var selectedTab = 0;
  
        for (var i = 0; i < numberOfItems; i++) {
          var linkElement = document.createElement('button')
          linkElement.innerHTML = tabTitleList[i]
          linkElement.href = fragmentSelectorList[i]
          // linkElement.target = "_blank";
          linkElement.type = "button";
          linkElement.id = "tab-menu_toggle_" + i;
  
          linkElement.dataset['tabbedIndex'] = i
  
          linkElement.dataset['authorable'] = ''
          linkElement.dataset['analytics_text'] = tabTitleList[i];
  
          linkElement.dataset['heroTitle'] = heroTitleList[i];
          linkElement.dataset['heroSubtitle'] = heroSubtitleList[i];
          linkElement.dataset['targetFragment'] = fragmentSelectorList[i];
  
          linkElement.dataset['tabHeaderTitle'] = tabHeaderTitleList[i];
          linkElement.dataset['tabHeaderCopy'] = tabHeaderCopyList[i];
  
          linkElement.dataset['triggeranalytics'] = '';
  
  
  
          // triggeranalytics
  
  
          menuContainer.appendChild(linkElement);
  
          linkElement.addEventListener('click', toggleFragment)
  
          if (i == 0) {
            document.getElementById('tab-menu_toggle_0').click();
          }
        }
  
        document.getElementById('tab-menu_arrows_prev').addEventListener('click', prevTab)
        document.getElementById('tab-menu_arrows_next').addEventListener('click', nextTab)
  
        function nextTab(e) {
          e.preventDefault() 
          var nextTabIndex = +selectedTab + 1
  
          if (nextTabIndex >= numberOfItems) {
            nextTabIndex = 0
          }
          var nextTabId = 'tab-menu_toggle_' + nextTabIndex;
          document.getElementById('tab-menu_toggle_' + nextTabIndex).click();
        }
  
        function prevTab(e) {
          e.preventDefault() 
          var nextTabIndex = +selectedTab - 1
  
          if (nextTabIndex <= 0) {
            nextTabIndex = +numberOfItems - 1
          }
  
          var nextTabId = 'tab-menu_toggle_' + nextTabIndex;
          document.getElementById('tab-menu_toggle_' + nextTabIndex).click();
        }
  
        function toggleFragment(e) {
  
  
          // Set the Hero
          var targetDataset = e.currentTarget.dataset;
          // document.getElementById('tab-menu_title').innerHTML = targetDataset['heroTitle'];
          // document.getElementById('tab-menu_subtitle').innerHTML = targetDataset['heroSubtitle'];
  
          document.getElementById('tab-menu_tab_header_title').innerHTML = targetDataset['tabHeaderTitle'];
          document.getElementById('tab-menu_tab_header_copy').innerHTML = targetDataset['tabHeaderCopy'];
  
          selectedTab = targetDataset['tabbedIndex'];
  
          // Toggle the Fragment View
  
          var targetFragment = document.getElementById(targetDataset['targetFragment']);
          var tabMenuNodes = document.getElementById('tab-menu_menu_container').childNodes;
  
          // console.log('tab-menu_menu');
          // console.log(tabMenuNodes);
  
  
          tabMenuNodes.forEach(function (tabMenu) {
            if (tabMenu) { tabMenu.classList.remove('selected'); }
          })
  
          e.currentTarget.classList.add('selected');
  
          if (targetFragment) {
            fragmentSelectorList.forEach(function (e) {
              var fragmentNode = document.getElementById(e);
              if (fragmentNode) {
                // fragmentNode.style.display = 'none';
                fragmentNode.style.position = 'absolute';
                fragmentNode.style.left = '-2000px';
              }
            })
            // targetFragment.style.display = 'inherit'
            targetFragment.style.position = 'inherit'
  
          }
  
  
  
  
  
        }
  
  
  
        // initStickyMenu(menuContainer)
  
  
        fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll('[data-authorable]').forEach(function (el) {
          if (el.tagName == 'A' && el.href.includes('$%7')) {
            if (el.parentNode.dataset.autorableContainer) {
              el.parentNode.style = 'display: none'
            } else {
              el.style = 'display: none'
            }
          } else if (el.tagName == 'P' && el.textContent.substring(0, 2) == '${') {
            el.style = 'display: none'
          } else if (el.tagName == 'H2' && el.textContent.includes('${')) {
            el.style = 'display: none'
          } else if (el.tagName == 'H2' && el.textContent.includes('${')) {
            el.style = 'display: none'
          } else if (el.tagName == 'BUTTON' && el.dataset.analytics_text.includes('${')) {
            el.style = 'display: none'
          }
        })
  
        var scrollPosition = 0
        var isScrollingDown = true
  
        function initStickyMenu(menuContainer) {
  
          // document.getElementById('tab-menu_toggle_0').click();
          window.onscroll = function () {
            adjustScroll()
          }
  
          var stickyNavMenu = document.getElementById('tab-menu_menu')
          var stickyNavMenuContainer = document.getElementById('tab-menu_menu_container')
          var isExistingHeader = menuContainer.dataset['is_existing_header']
          var isStickOnMobile = menuContainer.dataset['stick_on_mobile']
          var isStickOnDesktop = menuContainer.dataset['stick_on_desktop']
  
          var isMobile = stickyNavMenu.offsetWidth < 700;
  
          var sticky = getOffset(stickyNavMenu).top
  
          // var stickyNavHamburgerMenu = document.getElementById('tab-menu_hamburger_btn')
  
          // stickyNavHamburgerMenu.addEventListener('click', function () {
          //   // console.log(stickyNavMenuContainer.classList);
          //   stickyNavMenuContainer.classList.toggle('mobile-closed')
          // })
  
          if (isExistingHeader && isExistingHeader.toLowerCase() == 'yes') {
            sticky = sticky - document.querySelector('header').offsetHeight
          }
  
          if (isStickOnMobile != "yes" && isMobile) {
            stickyNavMenuContainer.classList.remove('mobile-closed');
            // stickyNavHamburgerMenu.style.display = 'none';
          }
  
  
  
          function adjustScroll() {
            // console.log(window.pageYOffset)
            isMobile = stickyNavMenu.offsetWidth < 700
  
  
            if (scrollPosition > window.pageYOffset) {
              isScrollingDown = false
              scrollPosition = window.pageYOffset
            } else {
              isScrollingDown = true
              scrollPosition = window.pageYOffset
            }
  
            if (window.pageYOffset >= sticky) {
  
              if (isStickOnMobile != 'yes' && isMobile) {
                return;
              }
  
              if (isStickOnDesktop != 'yes' && !isMobile) {
                return;
              }
  
              stickyNavMenu.classList.add('sticky')
  
              if (isExistingHeader && isExistingHeader.toLowerCase() == 'yes') {
                if (isScrollingDown && isMobile) {
                  stickyNavMenu.style.top = 0 + 'px'
                } else {
                  stickyNavMenu.style.top = document.querySelector('header').offsetHeight + 'px'
                }
              } else {
                stickyNavMenu.style.top = 0 + 'px'
              }
  
              // if (!isScrollingDown) {
  
              // } else {
              //   stickyNavMenu.style.top = 0 + 'px';
              // }
            } else {
              stickyNavMenu.classList.remove('sticky')
            }
          }
  
  
          // function
          function getOffset(el) {
            const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect()
            return {
              left: rect.left + window.scrollX,
              top: rect.top + window.scrollY,
            }
          }
        }
  
        var firstClick = true
  
        var PubID = dataLayer.custom.customConversion1.split(':').pop()
        if (PubID != '' && PubID != null) {
          PubID += ':'
        } else {
          PubID = 'null:'
        }
  
        fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll('[data-triggeranalytics]').forEach(function (el) {
          el.addEventListener('click', triggerAnalytics)
        })
  
        // $('.tab-menu a').click(triggerAnalytics)
  
        function triggerAnalytics(e) {
          
          var str = e.currentTarget['dataset']['analytics_text'] || e.currentTarget.innerHTML
          console.log(str)
          var tileName = str.replace(/\s/g, '-').toLowerCase()
          var FragType = 'tab-menu'
          var ActionType = 'click'
  
          if (window.hasOwnProperty('s')) {
            s.linkTrackVars = 'prop1,prop2,prop3,eVar72'
            s.eVar72 = PubID + FragType + ':' + ActionType + ':' + tileName
            s.eVar72 = s.eVar72.toLowerCase()
            s.prop1 = sc_country
            s.prop2 = sc_language
            s.prop3 = sc_country + ';' + sc_language
            if (firstClick) {
              s.linkTrackEvents = 'event71,event72,event23'
              s.events = 'event71,event72,event23'
              s.tl(this, 'o', s.eVar72)
              firstClick = false
            } else {
              s.linkTrackEvents = 'event71,event23'
              s.events = 'event71,event23'
              s.tl(this, 'o', s.eVar72)
            }
          }
        }
      }, 1000)
    })
  </script>

  <script>
    // hide disclaimer message box live & preview pages

        if (header.classList.contains('secondary-headline')) {
          header.style.display = 'none';

      });

    // iframe init, iframetracker, analytics

    $(document).ready(function () {
      //get all infograms on the page
      let targetNode = document.querySelectorAll('.anchorclass');
      let fragid = [];
      let mobileId = document.getElementById('infogram_0__/hs70GCdnq9yiiCMzsyTc').id;

      for (let i = 0; i < targetNode.length; i++) {
        //push the frag-id property to an array
        fragid.push(targetNode[i].dataset.fragid);

        //if frag-id was not entered, assign a random value
        if (fragid[i].substring(0, 3) === '${f') {
          fragid[i] = 'ig-null-' + Math.round(100000 * Math.random());
          let newClassID = 'infogram-' + fragid[i] + '-placeholder';
          targetNode[i].classList.add(newClassID);
          targetNode[i].setAttribute('data-fragid', fragid[i]);
        } else {
          targetNode[i].classList.add('infogram-' + fragid[i] + '-placeholder');
        }
      }

      if (mobileId.substr(0, 3) !== '${m' && screen.width <= 767) {
        document.getElementById(mobileId).parentElement.setAttribute('data-id', 'infogram_0__/hs70GCdnq9yiiCMzsyTc');
      }

      let igIframeID;

      if (mobileId.substr(0, 3) !== '${m' && screen.width <= 767) {
        igIframeID = mobileId;
      } else {
        igIframeID = 'infogram_0__/hs70GCdnq9yiiCMzsyTc';
      }

      if (typeof OnetrustActiveGroups === 'undefined' || OnetrustActiveGroups.indexOf(',1,') >= 0) {
        let igIframeStr = document.createElement('script');

        igIframeStr.setAttribute('title', 'infographic');
        igIframeStr.type = 'text/javascript';
        igIframeStr.src = '//e.infogr.am/js/dist/embed.js';

        $(".infogram-content-wrapper[data-id='" + igIframeID + "'] .infogram-content-placeholder").append(igIframeStr);

      for (let i = 0; i < targetNode.length; i++) {

      }

      // let igIframeID = 'infogram_0__/hs70GCdnq9yiiCMzsyTc';

      if (mobileId.substr(0, 3) !== '${m' && screen.width <= 767) {
        igIframeID = mobileId;
      } else {
        igIframeID = 'infogram_0__/hs70GCdnq9yiiCMzsyTc';
      }

      //check if iframe has been loaded
      if ($(".infogram-content-wrapper[data-id='" + igIframeID + "'] .infogram-content-placeholder iframe").length) {
        // when page loses focus check to see if the active element is an iframe
        $(window).on('blur', function () {
          let target = $(document.activeElement);
          if (target.is('iframe')) {
            let targetParent = target.parents('.infogram-content-placeholder');
            // check to see if targetParent exists
            if (targetParent.length) {
              // check if targetParent has been clicked. if not, fire analytics and add iframe-tracked class
              if (!targetParent.hasClass('iframe-tracked') && !targetParent.hasClass('yes')) {
                // get publication id
                let PubID = dataLayer.custom.customConversion1.split(':').pop();
                if (PubID != '' && PubID != null) {
                  PubID += ':';
                } else {
                  PubID = 'null:';

                // analytics

                let FragType = 'FRG-005';

                FragID = FragID.replace(/ /g, '-');
                if (FragID == '' || FragID.substring(0, 2) == '${') {
                  FragID = 'null';
                }
                let ActionType = 'first-interaction';

                // add iframe-tracked class
                targetParent.addClass('iframe-tracked');
              }
            }
          }
        });
        // reset focus to page
        $('.infogram-content-placeholder iframe').on('mouseleave', function () {
          $('.infogram-content-placeholder iframe').blur();
        });
      }
    });

          'Conventionally, risk has been seen as a barrier to cloud adoption. However, according to our survey, 91% of respondents have updated their security processes, and theyâ€™re reaping positive value from doing so. Overall, the top potential benefits or outcomes that respondents want to achieve with cloud cyber are: (1) improving their ability to detect and address security risks/threats (64%), and (2) improving customer digital trust (59%).',
          '${tab-header-copy-4}',
          '${tab-header-copy-5}',
          '${tab-header-copy-6}',
          '${tab-header-copy-7}',
          '${tab-header-copy-8}',
          '${tab-header-copy-9}',
          '${tab-header-copy-10}'
        ]
  
  
  
        var fragmentSelectorList = [
          '-fullwidth-component-tab2-1',
          '-fullwidth-component-tab2-2',
          '-fullwidth-component-tab2-3',
          '${fragment-selector-4}',
          '${fragment-selector-5}',
          '${fragment-selector-6}',
          '${fragment-selector-7}',
          '${fragment-selector-8}',
          '${fragment-selector-9}',
          '${fragment-selector-10}',
        ]
  
  
        var fragmentContainer = document.querySelector('#tab-menu-two')
        var menuContainer = fragmentContainer.querySelector('#tab-menu-two_menu_container')
  
        if (!menuContainer) {
          return
        }
  
        // console.log(menuContainer.dataset['numer_of_items'])
  
        var numberOfItems = menuContainer.dataset['numer_of_items'] || 0;
        var selectedTab = 0;
  
        for (var i = 0; i < numberOfItems; i++) {
          var linkElement = document.createElement('button')
          linkElement.innerHTML = tabTitleList[i]
          linkElement.href = fragmentSelectorList[i]
          // linkElement.target = "_blank";
          linkElement.type = "button";
          linkElement.id = "tab-menu-two_toggle_" + i;
  
          linkElement.dataset['tabbedIndex'] = i
  
          linkElement.dataset['authorable'] = ''
          linkElement.dataset['analytics_text'] = tabTitleList[i];
  
          linkElement.dataset['heroTitle'] = heroTitleList[i];
          linkElement.dataset['heroSubtitle'] = heroSubtitleList[i];
          linkElement.dataset['targetFragment'] = fragmentSelectorList[i];
  
          linkElement.dataset['tabHeaderTitle'] = tabHeaderTitleList[i];
          linkElement.dataset['tabHeaderCopy'] = tabHeaderCopyList[i];
  
          linkElement.dataset['triggeranalytics'] = '';
  
  
  
          // triggeranalytics
  
  
          menuContainer.appendChild(linkElement);
  
          linkElement.addEventListener('click', toggleFragment)
  
          if (i == 0) {
            document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_toggle_0').click();
          }
        }
  
        document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_arrows_prev').addEventListener('click', prevTab)
        document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_arrows_next').addEventListener('click', nextTab)
  
        function nextTab(e) {
          e.preventDefault() 
          var nextTabIndex = +selectedTab + 1
  
          if (nextTabIndex >= numberOfItems) {
            nextTabIndex = 0
          }
          var nextTabId = 'tab-menu-two_toggle_' + nextTabIndex;
          document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_toggle_' + nextTabIndex).click();
        }
  
        function prevTab(e) {
          e.preventDefault() 
          var nextTabIndex = +selectedTab - 1
  
          if (nextTabIndex <= 0) {
            nextTabIndex = +numberOfItems - 1
          }
  
          var nextTabId = 'tab-menu-two_toggle_' + nextTabIndex;
          document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_toggle_' + nextTabIndex).click();
        }
  
        function toggleFragment(e) {
  
  
          // Set the Hero
          var targetDataset = e.currentTarget.dataset;
          // document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_title').innerHTML = targetDataset['heroTitle'];
          // document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_subtitle').innerHTML = targetDataset['heroSubtitle'];
  
          document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_tab_header_title').innerHTML = targetDataset['tabHeaderTitle'];
          document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_tab_header_copy').innerHTML = targetDataset['tabHeaderCopy'];
  
          selectedTab = targetDataset['tabbedIndex'];
  
          // Toggle the Fragment View
  
          var targetFragment = document.getElementById(targetDataset['targetFragment']);
          var tabMenuNodes = document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_menu_container').childNodes;
  
          // console.log('tab-menu-two_menu');
          // console.log(tabMenuNodes);
  
  
          tabMenuNodes.forEach(function (tabMenu) {
            if (tabMenu) { tabMenu.classList.remove('selected'); }
          })
  
          e.currentTarget.classList.add('selected');
  
          if (targetFragment) {
            fragmentSelectorList.forEach(function (e) {
              var fragmentNode = document.getElementById(e);
              if (fragmentNode) {
                // fragmentNode.style.display = 'none';
                fragmentNode.style.position = 'absolute';
                fragmentNode.style.left = '-2000px';
              }
            })
            // targetFragment.style.display = 'inherit'
            targetFragment.style.position = 'inherit'
  
          }
  
  
  
  
  
        }
  
  
  
        // initStickyMenu(menuContainer)
  
  
        fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll('[data-authorable]').forEach(function (el) {
          if (el.tagName == 'A' && el.href.includes('$%7')) {
            if (el.parentNode.dataset.autorableContainer) {
              el.parentNode.style = 'display: none'
            } else {
              el.style = 'display: none'
            }
          } else if (el.tagName == 'P' && el.textContent.substring(0, 2) == '${') {
            el.style = 'display: none'
          } else if (el.tagName == 'H2' && el.textContent.includes('${')) {
            el.style = 'display: none'
          } else if (el.tagName == 'H2' && el.textContent.includes('${')) {
            el.style = 'display: none'
          } else if (el.tagName == 'BUTTON' && el.dataset.analytics_text.includes('${')) {
            el.style = 'display: none'
          }
        })
  
        var scrollPosition = 0
        var isScrollingDown = true
  
        function initStickyMenu(menuContainer) {
  
          // document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_toggle_0').click();
          window.onscroll = function () {
            adjustScroll()
          }
  
          var stickyNavMenu = document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_menu')
          var stickyNavMenuContainer = document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_menu_container')
          var isExistingHeader = menuContainer.dataset['is_existing_header']
          var isStickOnMobile = menuContainer.dataset['stick_on_mobile']
          var isStickOnDesktop = menuContainer.dataset['stick_on_desktop']
  
          var isMobile = stickyNavMenu.offsetWidth < 700;
  
          var sticky = getOffset(stickyNavMenu).top
  
          // var stickyNavHamburgerMenu = document.getElementById('tab-menu-two_hamburger_btn')
  
          // stickyNavHamburgerMenu.addEventListener('click', function () {
          //   // console.log(stickyNavMenuContainer.classList);
          //   stickyNavMenuContainer.classList.toggle('mobile-closed')
          // })
  
          if (isExistingHeader && isExistingHeader.toLowerCase() == 'yes') {
            sticky = sticky - document.querySelector('header').offsetHeight
          }
  
          if (isStickOnMobile != "yes" && isMobile) {
            stickyNavMenuContainer.classList.remove('mobile-closed');
            // stickyNavHamburgerMenu.style.display = 'none';
          }
  
  
  
          function adjustScroll() {
            // console.log(window.pageYOffset)
            isMobile = stickyNavMenu.offsetWidth < 700
  
  
            if (scrollPosition > window.pageYOffset) {
              isScrollingDown = false
              scrollPosition = window.pageYOffset
            } else {
              isScrollingDown = true
              scrollPosition = window.pageYOffset
            }
  
            if (window.pageYOffset >= sticky) {
  
              if (isStickOnMobile != 'yes' && isMobile) {
                return;
              }
  
              if (isStickOnDesktop != 'yes' && !isMobile) {
                return;
              }
  
              stickyNavMenu.classList.add('sticky')
  
              if (isExistingHeader && isExistingHeader.toLowerCase() == 'yes') {
                if (isScrollingDown && isMobile) {
                  stickyNavMenu.style.top = 0 + 'px'
                } else {
                  stickyNavMenu.style.top = document.querySelector('header').offsetHeight + 'px'
                }
              } else {
                stickyNavMenu.style.top = 0 + 'px'
              }
  
              // if (!isScrollingDown) {
  
              // } else {
              //   stickyNavMenu.style.top = 0 + 'px';
              // }
            } else {
              stickyNavMenu.classList.remove('sticky')
            }
          }
  
  
          // function
          function getOffset(el) {
            const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect()
            return {
              left: rect.left + window.scrollX,
              top: rect.top + window.scrollY,
            }
          }
        }
  
        var firstClick = true
  
        var PubID = dataLayer.custom.customConversion1.split(':').pop()
        if (PubID != '' && PubID != null) {
          PubID += ':'
        } else {
          PubID = 'null:'
        }
  
        fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll('[data-triggeranalytics]').forEach(function (el) {
          el.addEventListener('click', triggerAnalytics)
        })
  
        // $('.tab-menu-two a').click(triggerAnalytics)
  
        function triggerAnalytics(e) {
          
          var str = e.currentTarget['dataset']['analytics_text'] || e.currentTarget.innerHTML
          console.log(str)
          var tileName = str.replace(/\s/g, '-').toLowerCase()
          var FragType = 'tab-menu-two'
          var ActionType = 'click'
  
          if (window.hasOwnProperty('s')) {
            s.linkTrackVars = 'prop1,prop2,prop3,eVar72'
            s.eVar72 = PubID + FragType + ':' + ActionType + ':' + tileName
            s.eVar72 = s.eVar72.toLowerCase()
            s.prop1 = sc_country
            s.prop2 = sc_language
            s.prop3 = sc_country + ';' + sc_language
            if (firstClick) {
              s.linkTrackEvents = 'event71,event72,event23'
              s.events = 'event71,event72,event23'
              s.tl(this, 'o', s.eVar72)
              firstClick = false
            } else {
              s.linkTrackEvents = 'event71,event23'
              s.events = 'event71,event23'
              s.tl(this, 'o', s.eVar72)
            }
          }
        }
      }, 1000)
    })
  </script>

  <script>
  $(document).ready(function () {

    var crossBtn = '<div id="close-cloud-services-contact-us" class="close-cloud-services-contact-us"></div>';
    var titleText = "Let's talk".substring(0, 2) != "${" ? "Let's talk" : null;
    var descriptionText = "${description}".substring(0, 2) != "${" ? "${description}" : null;
    var buttonText = "${button-text}".substring(0, 2) != "${" ? "${button-text}" : crossBtn;
    var buttonAlignment = "center".substring(0, 2) != "${" ? "center" : "left";
    var isCollapsibleOpen = false;

    // configure the button/text link
    // var buttonStyle = "${button-style}".substring(0,2) != "${" ? "${button-style}" : "button";
    var buttonStyle = "button";

    var buttonId = "collapsible-button-cloud-services-contact-us";
    if (buttonStyle == "button") {
      $("#" + buttonId).removeClass("hidden");
    } else {
      //link style
      buttonId = "collapsible-link-cloud-services-contact-us";
      $("#" + buttonId).removeClass("hidden");
    }
    $("#container-cloud-services-contact-us .button-container").css("text-align", buttonAlignment);


    // Set text content, if configured
    if (titleText != null) {
      $("#main-title-cloud-services-contact-us").text(titleText);
    } else {
      $("#main-title-cloud-services-contact-us").addClass("hidden");
    }
    if (descriptionText != null) {
      $("#description-cloud-services-contact-us").text(descriptionText);
    } else {
      $("#description-cloud-services-contact-us").addClass("hidden");
    }

    $("#" + buttonId).append(buttonText);
    if (buttonStyle == "link") {
      $("#" + buttonId).append($("#collapsible-arrow-cloud-services-contact-us"));
      $("#collapsible-arrow-cloud-services-contact-us").attr("class", "");
    }

    // Open/Close the collapsible
    $("#" + buttonId).click(function (event) {
      event.preventDefault();
      $("#collapsible-cloud-services-contact-us").slideToggle(250);

      // scroll the content into view
      if (!isCollapsibleOpen) {
        var buttonOffset = $("#" + buttonId).offset();
        $('html, body').animate({
          scrollTop: buttonOffset.top - 95
        });
        $("#close-cloud-services-contact-us").addClass("opened");
      } else {
        $("#close-cloud-services-contact-us").removeClass("opened");
        if (titleText != null) {
          var textOffset = $("#main-title-cloud-services-contact-us").offset();
          $('html, body').animate({
            scrollTop: textOffset.top - 95
          });
        } else if (descriptionText != null) {
          var textOffset = $("#description-cloud-services-contact-us").offset();
          $('html, body').animate({
            scrollTop: textOffset.top - 95
          });
        }
      }
      isCollapsibleOpen = !isCollapsibleOpen;

      // Flip the arrow when using link-style
      if (buttonStyle == "link") {
        if ($("#collapsible-arrow-cloud-services-contact-us").attr("class") == "flip") {
          $("#collapsible-arrow-cloud-services-contact-us").attr("class", "");
        } else {
          $("#collapsible-arrow-cloud-services-contact-us").attr("class", "flip");
        }

      }
    });

  });
</script>

    var url = "/content/dam/html/us/scripts/current-release/gdpr-related/gdpr-country-list.js";
    $.getJSON(url, function (data) {
      $.each(data, function (index, country) {
        // build country dropdown list
        $("#country-cloud-services-contact-us").append("<option value=\"" + country.name + "\">" + country.name + "</option>");
      });
    });
  });

  // begin analytics
  var PubID = dataLayer.custom.customConversion1.split(":").pop();
  if (PubID != "" && PubID != null) {
    PubID += ":";
  }
  function sendAnalytics(FragType, ActionType, events) {
    return function (FragType, ActionType, events) {
      var FragID = "cloud-services-contact-us".replace(/\s/g, '-');
      if (FragID == "" || FragID.substring(0, 2) == "${") {
        FragID = null;
      }
      s.linkTrackVars = "prop1,prop2,prop3,eVar72";

      s.eVar72 = PubID + FragType + ":" + ActionType + ":" + FragID;
      s.eVar72 = s.eVar72.toLowerCase();

      s.prop1 = sc_country;
      s.prop2 = sc_language;
      s.prop3 = sc_country + ";" + sc_language;

      s.linkTrackEvents = events;
      s.events = events;
      s.tl(this, "o", s.eVar72);
    }.bind(this, FragType, ActionType, events);
  }

  function sendButtonAnalytics(FragType, State, ActionType, events) {
    return function (FragType, State, ActionType, events) {
      var FragID = "cloud-services-contact-us".replace(/\s/g, '-');
      if (FragID == "" || FragID.substring(0, 2) == "${") {
        FragID = null;
      }
      s.linkTrackVars = "prop1,prop2,prop3,eVar72";

      s.eVar72 = PubID + FragType + ":" + ActionType + ":" + State;
      s.eVar72 = s.eVar72.toLowerCase();

      s.prop1 = sc_country;
      s.prop2 = sc_language;
      s.prop3 = sc_country + ";" + sc_language;

      s.linkTrackEvents = events;
      s.events = events;
      s.tl(this, "o", s.eVar72);
    }.bind(this, FragType, State, ActionType, events);
  }

  // capture form input
  var formHasInput = false;
  $(formID + " :input").change(function () {
    if (!formHasInput) {
      (sendAnalytics("accordion-form", "form_start", "event23,event7,event71,event72"))();
    }
    formHasInput = true;
  });

  // Open/Close Accordion
  // var buttonID = ("${button-style}".substring(0,2) == "{?" || "${button-style}" == "button") ? "collapsible-button-cloud-services-contact-us" : "collapsible-link-cloud-services-contact-us";
  var buttonID = "collapsible-button-cloud-services-contact-us";

  var accordionButtonOpen = false;
  $("#" + buttonID).click(function () {
    if (!accordionButtonOpen) {
      (sendButtonAnalytics("accordion-form","button-open", "click", "event23,event71,event72"))();
      accordionButtonOpen = true;
    } else {
      accordionButtonOpen = false;
      (sendButtonAnalytics("accordion-form","button-close", "click", "event23,event71,event72"))();
    }
  });

  // capture form submission
  $(formID).submit(sendAnalytics("accordion-form", "form_submit", "event1,event71,event72"));
// end analytics
</script>

<script src="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js"></script>

  if (month < 10) {

  var day = d.getDate();
  var year = d.getFullYear();
  var consentDate = month + "-" + day + "-" + year;
  function recaptcha_callback() {
    $("input.form_button_submit").removeAttr("disabled");
    //consent date
    $("#consentDateMostRecent1-cloud-services-contact-us").val(consentDate);

</script>

                    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function(){

                       //leadership constructor
                      function Leader() {
                    
                          this.fragId = 'getintouchtest';

                          if(!isNaN(parseInt('${leaders-on-display}')) && '${leaders-on-display}' > 2){
                            this.leadersOnDisplay = '${leaders-on-display}';
                          }else{
                            this.leadersOnDisplay = 12;
                          }
                    
                         //check to see if incrementor is a number
                         if(!isNaN(parseInt('${increment-by}'))){
                            this.incrementBy = '${increment-by}';

                            this.btnTxt = "Show all";

                      Leader.prototype.seeMoreLeaders = function() {
                            var hiddenItems = document.querySelectorAll('#getintouchtest li.leadership-item.hidden'),
                                visibleItems = document.querySelectorAll('#getintouchtest li.leadership-item.show-more');
                    
                                //if there are hidden items unhide them
                            if(hiddenItems.length !== 0){                        
                                for(var i = 0; i < hiddenItems.length; i++) {
                                hiddenItems[i].classList.add('show-more');
                                $('.show-more').slideDown();
                                hiddenItems[i].classList.remove('hidden');
                                 
                                 //if the last item doesn't have the class hidden - change button copy to 'show less' since there are not more items to display
                                if(!hiddenItems[hiddenItems.length - 1].classList.contains('hidden')){
                                    this.btn.textContent = "Show less";
                                }
                                //display 12 items at a time if increment property is enabled
                                    if(i > this.incrementBy - 2){
                                        return;
                                    }
                              
                            }
                            }else{
                                //show less button - scroll to top
                                $('.show-more').slideUp();
                                var position = $("#getintouchtest").offset().top - $("#header").innerHeight() - 50;
                                $('html,body').animate({ scrollTop: position }, 'slow');
                               
                                this.btn.textContent = this.btnTxt;
                                //...and hide visible items except original first set of 12
                                visibleItems.forEach(function(ele,ind){
                                    ele.classList.add('hidden');
                                    ele.classList.remove('show-more');
                                });
                        
                      }
                      }
                      
                      Leader.prototype.setInfo = function() {
                      //if no leader information was entered, get out of the method - do nothing
                      if (typeof this.leadershipItems === 'string'){
                      return;
                      //otherwise store that array

                                    this.btn.textContent = this.btnTxt;

                        if(this.enableBtn === "yes" && this.leadershipItems.length > this.leadersOnDisplay){
                            this.seeMoreBtn.addEventListener('click', this.seeMoreLeaders.bind(this));
                            this.seeMoreBtn.classList.remove('hidden');
                        }else{
                            this.leadershipLi.classList.remove('hidden');
                        }
                      }
                    
                      var ul = document.querySelector('#getintouchtest .leadership-list');
                      
                          for(var i = 0; i < this.leadershipItems.length - 1; i++) {
                        
                              var newItem = this.leadershipLi.cloneNode(true);
                              ul.appendChild(newItem);
                      
                          }
                    
                          var leadershipItemName = document.querySelectorAll('#getintouchtest .leadership-item-name'),
                              leadershipItemDescription = document.querySelectorAll('#getintouchtest .leadership-item-desc'),
                              leadershipItemLink = document.querySelectorAll('#getintouchtest .leadership-item-cta'),
                              leadershipItemImg = document.querySelectorAll('#getintouchtest .leadership-item-img'),
                              leadershipItemImgLink = document.querySelectorAll('#getintouchtest .leadership-item-img-link');
                    
                        this.leadershipItems.forEach(function(ele, ind){
                    
                              leadershipItemName[ind].textContent = ele.name;
                            //   if(ele.description.includes('\n')){
                            //     console.log('gets 2');
                            //     let strArr = ele.description.split('\n');
                            //     leadershipItemDescription[ind].innerText = strArr.join('\n');
                            //   }else{
                                leadershipItemDescription[ind].innerHTML = ele.description;
                              //}
                              leadershipItemLink[ind].textContent = ele.link_text;
                              leadershipItemLink[ind].setAttribute('href', ele.link_path);
                              leadershipItemImg[ind].setAttribute('src', ele.image_path);
                              leadershipItemImg[ind].setAttribute('alt', ele.name);
                              leadershipItemImgLink[ind].setAttribute('href', ele.link_path);          
                    
                              if(ind < leadersDisplayed){
                                document.querySelectorAll('#getintouchtest li.leadership-item')[ind].classList.remove('hidden');
                              } 
                    
                          }); 
                            
                    }
                      //instantiate object
                      var leader_getintouchtest = new Leader();
                      //call setInfo method on newly created object
                      leader_getintouchtest.setInfo();
                    
                    });
                          
                      </script>

			s.events = "event71,event72,event23";
			s.tl(this, "o", s.eVar72);
			firstClick = false;
  
		  } else {

			s.events = "event71,event23";
			s.tl(this, "o", s.eVar72);
		  }
		}

	});

    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://www2.deloitte.com/content/dam/html/us/deloitte-platforms/current-release/js/cloud-navigation.v1.9.js"></script>
    
    <style>
        .fragment-topnav-strip {
            position: fixed;
            z-index: 100;
            width: 100%
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav {
            background: #1b1b1b;
            font-size: 1.6em;
            font-weight: 300;
            opacity: 0;
            width: 100%;
            max-height: calc(100vh - 91px);
            -webkit-transition: opacity .5s ease-out;
            -o-transition: opacity .5s ease-out;
            transition: opacity .5s ease-out
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav.is-visible {
            opacity: 1
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-wrapper {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: flex;
            -webkit-box-pack: center;
            -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
            -webkit-box-align: center;
            -ms-flex-align: center;
            align-items: center;
            position: relative;
            min-height: 50px
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-trigger {
            position: absolute;
            right: 22px;
            top: 14px;
            display: block;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            cursor: pointer
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-trigger.is-open {
            -webkit-transform: rotate(-180deg);
            -ms-transform: rotate(-180deg);
            transform: rotate(-180deg)
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-trigger:after,
        .fragment-topnav-trigger:before {
            position: absolute;
            top: 6px;
            width: 1px;
            height: 12px;
            overflow: hidden;
            background: #fff;
            content: ""
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-trigger:before {
            left: 6px;
            -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg);
            -ms-transform: rotate(-45deg);
            transform: rotate(-45deg)
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-trigger:after {
            left: 14px;
            -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
            -ms-transform: rotate(45deg);
            transform: rotate(45deg)
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-nav {
            display: none
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-nav.is-visible {
            display: block
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-text-header {
            font-size: 20px;
            line-height: 1.25;
            font-weight: 400;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-text-header a {
            position: relative;
            color: #fff
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-text-header a:hover {
            color: #8cc527
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-text-header a:hover:after {
            content: "";
            display: block;
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -14px;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 4px;
            background: #8cc527
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-homelink,
        .fragment-topnav-logo {
            display: block;
            width: 145px;
            height: auto;
            margin: 0 auto
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-nav-social {
            /* font-size: 12px; */
            position: absolute;
            top: 100%;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            background: #333
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-navlistitem {
            margin: 0;
            border-top: 1px solid #666767;
            position: relative
        }
    
        .fragment-subnav-trigger {
            top: 7px
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-link,
        .fragment-topnav-link:visited {
            color: #fff
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-link {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 5px 0 11px;
            position: relative;
            margin-left: 20px
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-link.is-active-link,
        .fragment-topnav-link.is-subnav-active,
        .fragment-topnav-navlistitem:hover .fragment-topnav-link,
        .fragment-topnav-subnav-link:hover,
        .fragment-topnav-subnav-link:visited:hover {
            color: #8cc527
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-link.is-active-link:after,
        .fragment-topnav-link.is-subnav-active:after,
        .fragment-topnav-navlistitem:hover .fragment-topnav-link:after,
        .fragment-topnav-subnav-link:hover:after {
            content: "";
            display: block;
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 4px;
            background: #8cc527
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-subnav-link:hover:after {
            bottom: -3px
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-link.is-first-link:before {
            display: none
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-subnav {
            display: none;
            border-top: 1px solid #666767;
            padding-bottom: 20px;
            max-height: calc(100vh - 226px);
            overflow-y: auto
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-subnav table {
            border-top: 5px solid #000
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-subnav-item {
            padding: 15px 20px 0;
            margin: 0
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-subnav-link {
            position: relative;
            color: #fff
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-subnav-link:visited {
            color: #fff
        }
    
        .box-link,
        .green-dot-animation {
            display: none !important
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-social {
            display: none;
            border-top: 1px solid #666767;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            font-size: .75em
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-social.is-visible {
            display: block
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-social ul li {
            font-size: 1em;
            margin-right: 10px;
            vertical-align: middle
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-social ul li a {
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-social ul li a:not(:hover) {
            background-color: #959293 !important
        }
    
        .fragment-topnav-social-label {
            color: #959293;
            position: relative;
            top: 1px
        }
    
        @media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
            .fragment-topnav-subnav table {
                width: 100%
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav-item {
                display: block
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav-item br {
                display: none
            }
        }
    
        @media only screen and (min-width:768px) {
            .fragment-topnav-strip {
                position: fixed;
                left: 0;
                z-index: 999;
                width: 100%;
                margin-top: -1px
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav {
                text-align: center;
                padding: 0;
                font-size: 1.1em;
                overflow: visible;
                position: relative
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav:after {
                content: "";
                display: block;
                width: 50%;
                height: 100%;
                background: #333;
                position: absolute;
                top: 0;
                right: 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-wrapper {
                width: 96%;
                -webkit-box-pack: justify;
                -ms-flex-pack: justify;
                justify-content: space-between;
                margin: 0 auto;
                position: relative
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-trigger {
                position: static;
                display: inline-block;
                width: auto;
                height: auto;
                margin-left: 5px
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-trigger .icon-chevron {
                color: #fff;
                font-size: .6em
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-trigger .icon-chevron:before {
                content: "\f078";
                -webkit-transition: color .3s linear;
                -o-transition: color .3s linear;
                transition: color .3s linear
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-link:after,
            .fragment-topnav-link:before {
                content: "";
                position: absolute
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-trigger:after,
            .fragment-topnav-trigger:before {
                display: none
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-nav-social {
                display: -webkit-box;
                display: -ms-flexbox;
                display: flex;
                -webkit-box-pack: justify;
                -ms-flex-pack: justify;
                justify-content: space-between;
                -webkit-box-align: center;
                -ms-flex-align: center;
                align-items: center;
                -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
                box-sizing: border-box;
                position: relative;
                top: auto;
                left: auto;
                width: 75.5%;
                height: 50px;
                padding-left: 15px;
                z-index: 1
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-nav {
                display: block
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-homelink,
            .fragment-topnav-logo {
                width: 150px;
                height: 25px;
                margin: 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem {
                border: 0;
                display: inline-block;
                margin-left: 28px
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-link.is-first-link,
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem:first-of-type {
                margin-left: 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-link {
                position: relative;
                display: inline-block;
                padding: 14px 0;
                border: 0;
                margin: 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-link:before {
                left: -16px;
                top: 50%;
                width: 1px;
                height: 16px;
                background: #6d7171;
                margin: -8px 0 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-link:after {
                z-index: 2;
                display: none;
                width: 100%;
                height: 4px;
                overflow: hidden;
                background: #8cc527
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-social {
                display: block;
                border-top: 0;
                padding: 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-spacer {
                display: block;
                overflow: hidden;
                width: 24.5%
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-logo-container {
                width: 24.5%;
                -webkit-box-flex: 24.5%;
                -ms-flex: 24.5% 0 0px;
                flex: 24.5% 0 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-text-header {
                display: block;
                font-size: 1em;
                text-align: left
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav {
                position: absolute;
                top: 100%;
                left: -15px;
                padding: 20px 15px 0;
                background: #333;
                z-index: 1000;
                text-align: left;
                border: 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav table {
                border-top: none
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem:hover .fragment-topnav-subnav {
                display: block
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem .fragment-topnav-trigger.is-open .icon-chevron:before,
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem:hover .fragment-topnav-trigger .icon-chevron:before {
                content: "\f077";
                color: #8cc527
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav-item {
                width: 110px;
                padding: 0 20px 15px 0;
                vertical-align: top
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav-link {
                display: inline-block;
                font-size: 14px;
                vertical-align: top;
                white-space: nowrap
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav-link small {
                font-size: xx-small;
                white-space: inherit;
                pointer-events: none;
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem.has-subnav {
                padding-right: 20px
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem.has-subnav:hover .fragment-topnav-subnav {
                display: none
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem.has-subnav .fragment-topnav-trigger {
                display: inline-block;
                top: 13px;
                right: 0;
                width: 15px;
                height: 15px
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem.has-subnav .fragment-topnav-trigger.is-open {
                -webkit-transform: rotate(0);
                -ms-transform: rotate(0);
                transform: rotate(0)
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem.has-subnav .fragment-topnav-trigger:after,
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem.has-subnav .fragment-topnav-trigger:before {
                height: 10px;
                top: 2px
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem.has-subnav .fragment-topnav-trigger:before {
                left: 3px
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-navlistitem.has-subnav .fragment-topnav-trigger:after {
                left: 10px
            }
        }
    
        @media only screen and (min-width:900px) {
            .fragment-topnav {
                font-size: 1.2em
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-link:after {
                top: auto;
                bottom: 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-nav {
                clear: none
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-social {
                font-size: 1em
            }
        }
    
        @media (min-width:768px) and (max-width:1079px) {
            .fragment-topnav::after {
                display: none
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-wrapper {
                display: block
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-wrapper>.fragment-topnav-trigger {
                display: none
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-logo-container {
                width: 100%;
                height: 40px;
                display: -webkit-box;
                display: -ms-flexbox;
                display: flex;
                -webkit-box-align: center;
                -ms-flex-align: center;
                align-items: center
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-nav-social {
                width: auto;
                height: 40px;
                margin-left: -2%;
                margin-right: -2%;
                padding-left: 2%;
                padding-right: 2%
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-link {
                padding: 12px 0
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav {
                padding-left: 20px;
                left: -20px;
                max-width: 100vh
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-subnav-item {
                padding-right: 10px
            }
        }
    
        @media only screen and (min-width:1080px) {
            .fragment-topnav {
                font-size: 1.6em
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-wrapper {
                width: 100%;
                max-width: 1200px;
                margin: 0 auto
            }
    
            .fragment-topnav-social {
                font-size: .75em
            }
        }
    
        @media only screen and (min-width:768px) {
            .main-container.content-page {
                margin-top: 0 !important
            }
    
            .right-content-section.fragmentnav-right-scrolled,
            .right-content-section.right-scrolled {
                margin-top: 20px !important
            }
        }
    
        @media screen and (max-width:767px) and (min-width:260px) {
            #header {
                position: fixed
            }
        }
    </style>

    <script>
    
        function createCloudNavOutput(input) {
            var output = {
                navigationText: [],
                navigationURL: [],
                navigationActiveState: [],
                numberOfSubnavRows: [],
                navigationSubnavText: Array(10)
                    .fill(null)
                    .map(() => ["", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", ""]),
                navigationSubnavURL: Array(10)
                    .fill(null)
                    .map(() => ["", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", ""]),
            };
    
            for (var idx = 0; idx < input.length; idx++) {
                if (input[idx].isActive === "yes") {
                    if (input[idx].activeState) {
                        output.navigationActiveState.push(input[idx].activeState);
                    } else {
                        output.navigationActiveState[idx] = `$\{navigation-item${idx + 1}-active\}`;
                    }
    
                    if (input[idx].text) {
                        output.navigationText.push(input[idx].text);
                    } else {
                        output.navigationText[idx] = `$\{navigation-item${idx + 1}-text\}`;
                    }
    
                    if (input[idx].link) {
                        output.navigationURL.push(input[idx].link);
                    } else {
                        output.navigationURL[idx] = `$\{navigation-item${idx + 1}-link\}`;
                    }
    
                    if (input[idx].rowCount) {
                        output.numberOfSubnavRows.push(input[idx].rowCount);
                    } else {
                        output.numberOfSubnavRows[idx] = `$\{navigation-item${idx + 1}-subnavrows\}`;
                    }
                } else {
                    output.navigationText[idx] = `$\{navigation-item${idx + 1}-text\}`;
                    output.navigationURL[idx] = `$\{navigation-item${idx + 1}-link\}`;
                    output.numberOfSubnavRows[idx] = `$\{navigation-item${idx + 1}-subnavrows\}`;
                    output.navigationActiveState[idx] = `$\{navigation-item${idx + 1}-active\}`;
                }
            }
    
            // Fill the remaining placeholders
            for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
                for (var navIndx = 0; navIndx < 10; navIndx++) {
                    if (input[i] && input[i].isActive == "yes" && input[i].subNavItems && input[i].subNavItems.length && input[i].subNavItems[navIndx] && input[i].subNavItems[navIndx].isActive) {
                        output.navigationSubnavText[navIndx][i] = input[i].subNavItems[navIndx].text;
                        output.navigationSubnavURL[navIndx][i] = input[i].subNavItems[navIndx].link;
                    } else {
                        if (navIndx == 0) {
                            output.navigationSubnavText[navIndx][i] = `$\{navigation-item${i + 1}-subnav-text\}`;
                            output.navigationSubnavURL[navIndx][i] = `$\{navigation-item${i + 1}-subnav-link\}`;
                        } else {
                            output.navigationSubnavText[navIndx][i] = `$\{navigation-item${i + 1}-subnavrow${navIndx + 1}-text\}`;
                            output.navigationSubnavURL[navIndx][i] = `$\{navigation-item${i + 1}-subnavrow${navIndx + 1}-link\}`;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (!output.navigationText[i]) {
                    output.navigationText[i] = `$\{navigation-item${i + 1}-text\}`;
                }
                if (!output.navigationURL[i]) {
                    output.navigationURL[i] = `$\{navigation-item${i + 1}-link\}`;
                }
                if (!output.numberOfSubnavRows[i]) {
                    output.numberOfSubnavRows[i] = `$\{navigation-item${i + 1}-subnavrows\}`;
                }
                if (!output.navigationActiveState[i]) {

        function formatNavInput(data) {

                navigationLogoURL: [],

                navigationHeader: [],

            if (data["navigationLogoURL"]) {

            if (data["navigationLogoAltText"]) {

            } else {

            if (data["navigationHeader"]) {

            } else {
                navOutputData.navigationHeader = ["${navigation-header}"];
            }
            if (data["navigationMobileHeader"]) {
                navOutputData.navigationMobileHeader = [data.navigationMobileHeader];
            } else {
                navOutputData.navigationMobileHeader = ["${navigation-mobile-header}"];
            }
    
            var navigationItemsFormated = createCloudNavOutput(data.navigationItems);
    
            navOutputData.navigationText = navigationItemsFormated.navigationText;
            navOutputData.navigationURL = navigationItemsFormated.navigationURL;
            navOutputData.navigationActiveState = navigationItemsFormated.navigationActiveState;
            navOutputData.numberOfSubnavRows = navigationItemsFormated.numberOfSubnavRows;
            navOutputData.navigationSubnavText = navigationItemsFormated.navigationSubnavText;
            navOutputData.navigationSubnavURL = navigationItemsFormated.navigationSubnavURL;
    
            return navOutputData;
        }
