                for (var socialItem in navigationSocial) {
                    if (navigationSocial[socialItem] == "true") navigationSocialActive = true;
                }
    
                var numberOfLinks = data.navigationItemCount, // Number of navgiation cols
                    renderedLogo = "", // Logo to be used in navigation
                    renderedLinks = ""; // String containing generated navigation items
    
                if (numberOfLinks == "" || numberOfLinks.substring(0, 2) == "${") numberOfLinks = "0";
    
                renderedLogo += "<div class=\"fragment-topnav-logo-container\">\n";
                // Build the navigation logo
                if (data.navigationLogoImage[0] != "" && data.navigationLogoImage[0].substring(0, 2) != "${") {
                    // If the logo has a link associated with it, wrap it in an anchor
                    if (data.navigationLogoURL[0] != "" && data.navigationLogoURL[0].substring(0, 2) != "${") {
                        renderedLogo += "     <a class='fragment-topnav-homelink' href='" + data.navigationLogoURL + "' onclick=\"navigationLogoClick('logo click')\">";
                    }
                    renderedLogo += "       <img class='fragment-topnav-logo' src='" + data.navigationLogoImage + "' alt='" + data.navigationLogoAltText + "'";
                    // Add alt text to the image
                    renderedLogo += ">\n";
                    if (data.navigationLogoURL[0] != "" && data.navigationLogoURL[0].substring(0, 2) != "${") {
                        renderedLogo += "     </a>\n";
                    }
                } else {
                    var navigationHeaderText = "";
    
                    // Set text to data.navigationHeader, fallback to data.navigationMobileHeader
                    if (data.navigationHeader[0] != "" && data.navigationHeader[0].substring(0, 2) != "${") {
                        navigationHeaderText = data.navigationHeader[0];
                    } else if (data.navigationMobileHeader[0] != "" && data.navigationMobileHeader[0].substring(0, 2) != "${") {
                        navigationHeaderText = data.navigationMobileHeader[0];
                    }
    
                    if (navigationHeaderText != "") {
                        // If there's no logo, but there is a title set
                        renderedLogo += "<div class='fragment-topnav-text-header'>"
                        // If the logo has a link associated with it, wrap it in an anchor
                        if (data.navigationLogoURL[0] != "" && data.navigationLogoURL[0].substring(0, 2) != "${") {
                            renderedLogo += "     <a href='" + data.navigationLogoURL + "' onclick=\"navigationLogoClick('logo click')\">" + navigationHeaderText + "</a>\n";
                        } else {
                            renderedLogo += navigationHeaderText + "\n";
                        }
                        renderedLogo += "</div>\n";
                    }
                }
                renderedLogo += "</div>\n";
    
                // Start building the navigation
                renderedLinks += "  <div class='fragment-topnav item-count-" + numberOfLinks + "'>\n";
                renderedLinks += "    <div class='fragment-topnav-wrapper'>\n";
                if (renderedLogo.length > 0) {
                    renderedLinks += renderedLogo;
                }
                renderedLinks += "      <div class='fragment-topnav-nav-social'>\n";
                renderedLinks += "      <nav class='fragment-topnav-nav'><ul>\n";
    
                // Loop through each navigation item
                for (var i = 0; i < numberOfLinks; i++) {
                    // Generate the link classname
                    classname = "fragment-topnav-link js-nav-link";
                    if (data.navigationActiveState[i] === "yes") {
                        classname += " is-active-link";
                    }
                    if (i === 0) {
                        classname += " is-first-link";
                    }
                    if (i == numberOfLinks - 1) {
                        classname += " is-last-link";
                    }
    
                    // Generate HTML for each link
                    var topNavLinkHref = "#";
                    if (data.navigationURL[i] != "" && data.navigationURL[i].charAt(0) != "$") topNavLinkHref = data.navigationURL[i];
    
                    renderedLinks += "        <li class='fragment-topnav-navlistitem'>\n";
                    renderedLinks += "          <a class=\"" + classname + "\" href=\"" + topNavLinkHref + "\" onclick=\"navigationMenuClick('" + data.navigationText[i] + "', 'click')\">" + data.navigationText[i] + "</a>\n";
    
                    // If there is a defined subnav, render those items
                    if (data.navigationSubnavText[0][i] != "" && data.navigationSubnavText[0][i].substring(0, 2) != "${" && data.navigationSubnavURL[0][i] != "" && data.navigationSubnavURL[0][i].substring(0, 2) != "${") {
    
                        var subNavRows = data.numberOfSubnavRows[i];
                        if (subNavRows == "" || subNavRows.substring(0, 2) == "${") {
                            subNavRows = 0;
                        } else if (subNavRows > 10) {
                            subNavRows = 10;
                        }
    
                        // Only if between 1 and 10 rows
                        if (subNavRows > 0) {
                            var subNavClass = "fragment-topnav-subnav js-subnav";
                            renderedLinks += "        <span class='fragment-topnav-trigger fragment-subnav-trigger js-subnav-trigger' data-analytics_text='"+data.navigationText[i]+" dropdown' data-triggeranalytics='true'><i class=\"icon-chevron\"></i></span>\n";
                            renderedLinks += "        <div class='" + subNavClass + "'><table>\n";
                            for (var rowI = 0; rowI < subNavRows; rowI++) {
                                renderedLinks += "        <tr>\n";
                                var subNavColLinkText = data.navigationSubnavText[rowI][i].split('|');
                                var subNavColLinkUrls = data.navigationSubnavURL[rowI][i].split('|');
                                var subNavColItemCount = subNavColLinkText.length;
                                if (subNavColItemCount > 6) subNavColItemCount = 6;
                                for (var colI = 0; colI < subNavColItemCount; colI++) {
                                    renderedLinks += "        <td class='fragment-topnav-subnav-item'><a class='fragment-topnav-subnav-link' href=\"" + subNavColLinkUrls[colI] + "\">" + subNavColLinkText[colI] + "</a></td>\n";
                                }
                                renderedLinks += "        </tr>\n";
                            }
                            renderedLinks += "        </table></div>\n";
                        }
                    }
    
                    // Close the link list item
                    renderedLinks += "        </li>\n";
                }
    
                // Once the navigation build is complete, add it to the page
                renderedLinks += "      </ul></nav>\n";
    
                // If social links have been defined, add them to the fragment
                if (navigationSocialActive) {
                    renderedLinks += "<div class='fragment-topnav-social social-share-links'>\n";
    
                    renderedLinks += "  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"nav_social_img\" value=\"" + shareimg + "\"/>\n";
                    renderedLinks += "  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"nav_social_desc\" value=\"" + sharedesc + "\"/>\n";
                    renderedLinks += "  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"nav_social_url\" value=\"" + shareurl + "\"/>\n";
                    renderedLinks += "  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"nav_social_title\" value=\"" + sharetitle + "\"/>\n";
                    renderedLinks += "  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"nav_social_sitename\" value=\"" + sharesitename + "\"/>\n";
                    renderedLinks += "  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"nav_social_twittertags\" value=\"" + sharetwittertags + "\"/>\n";
    
                    if (sharetwitter != "" && sharetwitter.substring(0, 2) != "${") { renderedLinks += "  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"nav_social_twitter\" value=\"" + sharetwitter + "\"/>\n"; }
                    else renderedLinks += "  <input type=\"hidden\" name=\"nav_social_twitter\" value=\"DeloitteUS\"/>\n";
    
                    renderedLinks += "  <ul>\n";
                    renderedLinks += "	<li><span class='fragment-topnav-social-label'>Share</span></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.facebook == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-facebook' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('facebook');navigationSocialClick('facebook');\" title='Facebook' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.linkedin == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-linkedin' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('linkedin');navigationSocialClick('linkedin');\" title='LinkedIn' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.twitter == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-twitter' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('twitter');navigationSocialClick('twitter');\" title='Twitter' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.google == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-googleplus' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('googleplus');navigationSocialClick('googleplus');\" title='Google Plus' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.email == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-email' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('email');navigationSocialClick('email');\" title='Email' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.weibo == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-weibo' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('weibo');navigationSocialClick('weibo');\" title='Weibo' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.renren == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-renren' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('renren');navigationSocialClick('renren');\" title='Renren' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.vk == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-vk' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('vk');navigationSocialClick('vk');\" title='VK' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.xing == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-xing' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('xing');navigationSocialClick('xing');\" title='Xing' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    if (navigationSocial.pinterest == "true") renderedLinks += "	<li><a class='icon-pinterest' onclick=\"nav_fragment_actions.nav_social_share('pinterest');navigationSocialClick('pinterest');\" title='Pinterest' href='#'></a></li>\n";
                    renderedLinks += "      </ul>\n  </div>\n";
                }
    
                renderedLinks += "      </div>\n <span class='fragment-topnav-trigger js-topnav-trigger' data-analytics_text='mobile dropdown' data-triggeranalytics='true'></span>\n";
                renderedLinks += "      </div>\n  </div>\n";
    
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $("#navigation-fragment").append(renderedLinks);
                    // Apply dynamic navigation styling
                    nav_fragment_actions.mobile_nav();
                    nav_fragment_actions.sub_nav();
                    nav_fragment_actions.style_nav();
                    nav_fragment_actions.remove_buttons();
                    nav_fragment_actions.anchor_links();
                }, 100);
    
                setTimeout(function () {
                    var disnode = document.querySelectorAll('#navigation-fragment small');
                    if (disnode && disnode.length) {
                        disnode.forEach(function (e) {
                            e.parentNode.style.fontSize = 'xx-small';
                            e.parentNode.style.whiteSpace = 'inherit';
                            e.parentNode.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
                        })
                    }
                }, 100);
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $('#navigation-fragment a').click(triggerNavAnalytics)
                    
                    var fragmentContainer = document.getElementById('navigation-fragment');
                    fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll("[data-triggeranalytics]").forEach(function (el) {
                        el.addEventListener("click", triggerNavAnalytics)
                    })
                }, 3000);
            }
    
            initNav();
    
            // function setupAnalytics() {
            //     $('.deloitte-cloud-nav a').click(triggerNavAnalytics)
            // }
        })
    
    </script>
    
    <script>
        var firstClick = true
    
        var PubID = dataLayer.custom.customConversion1.split(':').pop()
        if (PubID != '' && PubID != null) {
            PubID += ':'
        } else {
            PubID = 'null:'
        }
    
        // fragmentContainer.querySelectorAll("[data-triggerNavanalytics]").forEach(function (el) {
        //   el.addEventListener("click", triggerNavAnalytics)
        // })
    
        function triggerNavAnalytics(e) {
            var str = e.currentTarget['dataset']['analytics_text'] || e.currentTarget.innerHTML;

            str = str.replace(/ &/g, '');
            str = str.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9 ]/g, "")
            str = str.replace(/--/g, '');
            str = str.replace(/  /g, ' ');
            var tileName = str.replace(/\s/g, '-').toLowerCase()
            var FragType = 'deloitte-cloud-nav'
            var ActionType = 'click'
    
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('s')) {
                s.linkTrackVars = 'prop1,prop2,prop3,eVar72'
                s.eVar72 = PubID + FragType + ':' + ActionType + ':' + tileName
                s.eVar72 = s.eVar72.toLowerCase()
                s.prop1 = sc_country
                s.prop2 = sc_language
                s.prop3 = sc_country + ';' + sc_language

                if(!s.eVar72) {
                    return;
                }

                if (firstClick) {
                    s.linkTrackEvents = 'event71,event72,event23'
                    s.events = 'event71,event72,event23'
                    s.tl(this, 'o', s.eVar72)
                    firstClick = false
                } else {
                    s.linkTrackEvents = 'event71,event23'
                    s.events = 'event71,event23'
                    s.tl(this, 'o', s.eVar72)
                }
            }
        }
    </script>

    function getCookie(name) 
    {
        var dc = document.cookie;
        var prefix = name + "=";
        var begin = dc.indexOf("; " + prefix);
        if (begin == -1) {
            begin = dc.indexOf(prefix);
            if (begin != 0) return null;
        }
        else
        {
            begin += 2;
            var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", begin);
            if (end == -1) {
                end = dc.length;
            }
        }
        return unescape(dc.substring(begin + prefix.length, end));
    }
